content.title: Myth Buster: 'You Need a Lot of Money to Start Trading'
content.subtitle: Many believe trading is only for the wealthy or those with big savings.

myth.title: The Myth
myth.text: You need thousands of dollars to start trading and only rich people can participate in the markets.

reality.title: The Reality
reality.text: Many brokers allow you to start trading with small amounts. Success depends more on knowledge and discipline than on the size of your account.

whyMyth.title: Why It's a Myth
whyMyth.text: Modern trading platforms and fractional shares make it possible to begin with as little as $10 or $20. Learning and practicing with small amounts is a smart way to start.

impact.title: Impact of This Misconception
impact.text: Believing you need a lot of money stops many people from learning and building skills. It can also lead to risky behavior if someone invests more than they can afford.

evidence.text: 'Many online brokers have no minimum deposit and allow you to buy fractional shares, making trading accessible to almost everyone.'
'Start small and learn as you go. Even a small account can teach you the basics of trading and risk management.'

takeaways: You can start trading with a small amount of money
Focus on learning and practicing, not just account size
Start small, manage risk, and grow your skills over time
